alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 21 at 4:15AM PST until December 22 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...MORE SNOW ON THE WAY FOR THE CASCADES TUESDAY NIGHT AND WEDNESDAY... .Another storm system will take aim at the Cascades of southwest Washington and central and northern Oregon beginning Tuesday evening and persist through much of Wednesday, bringing the potential for more heavy snow above roughly 3,500 feet. ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...A mixture of freezing rain, sleet and snow possible, with some accumulation of ice and snow. * WHERE...Upper Hood River Valley. * WHEN...Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be hazardous due to snow and ice covered roads.
info.instruction: Please monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this developing weather situation. If you have travel plans, be prepared to have an alternative plan our route, and keep snow chains and a winter survival kit in your vehicle.
